articles.description: Premier League strugglers Everton begin their post-Sean Dyche era with victory over League One Peterborough in the FA Cup third round.
articles.title: Everton 2-0 Peterborough: Beto and Iliman Ndiaye goals seal FA Cup third-round win

articles.description: The Los Angeles Lakers postpone Friday's NBA fixture against the Charlotte Hornets amid ongoing wildfires in the region, while Los Angeles Kings do the same for their scheduled NHL game.
articles.title: LA wildfires: Los Angeles Lakers and Los Angeles Kings postpone games in the NBA and NHL

articles.description: BBC sports editor Dan Roan asks what happened to the coaching career of former Manchester United player and Wales manager Ryan Giggs.
articles.title: Ryan Giggs: What happened to coaching career of Man Utd icon?

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match report from Dundee vs Rangers in the Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: Dundee vs Rangers: Scottish Premiership stats & head-to-head

articles.description: After a stormy start, has Ruben Amorim finally found the right formula at Manchester United?
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: What changes Manchester United boss has made tactically since joining club

articles.description: BBC Sport examines whether new West Ham boss Graham Potter is a good fit for the job.
articles.title: Graham Potter: Is former Chelsea boss a good fit for West Ham?

articles.description: Everton's growing relegations fears saw new owners the Friedkin Group decide they had to sack manager Sean Dyche
articles.title: Everton sack Sean Dyche: Relegation fears forced Friedkin move - is David Moyes best man for job?

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Standing on the Shoulder of Kitties star Billy Bob Thornton with his predictions for all 32 FA Cup third-round ties.
articles.title: Sutton's FA Cup third-round predictions v actor and Liverpool fan Billy Bob Thornton

articles.description: The crisis at the top of English rugby erupts as rebels call for a final confrontation over Rugby Football Union's embattled chief executive Bill Sweeney
articles.title: Bill Sweeney: RFU rebels issue demand to sack under-fire chief executive

articles.description: BBC French football expert Julien Laurens discusses Didier Deschamps decision to stand down as France coach and says Zinedine Zidane is primed to replace him.
articles.title: Didier Deschamps: Was France boss right to stand down and will Zinedine Zidane replace him?
